title: Google TV announces ‘Favorite Channels’ for Live TV tab – Here’s how it works [Gallery]
content:
While we’re still waiting on some bigger features to arrive, Google has just announced one of the first new additions to its TV platform in quite some time. Google TV’s Live tab is adding “Favorite Channels” for some services.

more…

The post Google TV announces ‘Favorite Channels’ for Live TV tab – Here’s how it works [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Rolling out now, Google TV is adding a "Favorite Channels" feature for live services such as YouTube TV and Sling TV.
